Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: ...you're so fuckin' beautiful, you know that...?
CONTINUED:

Speaker: rosario diaz
Dialogue: I love you, baby...

Speaker: muffled voice
Dialogue: Bobby!   You in there?

Speaker: rosario diaz
Dialogue: It's Jumbo... We gotta go anyway...

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: I'll be out in a second, Louis!
CONTINUED:

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: What the fuck's goin' on in here?

Speaker: louis falsetti
Dialogue: Okay, Bobkes! Looks like you got everything under control here--so uh, so I'm gonna go outside, take my break!

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: Yeah--just keep that wide load of yours outta trouble, arright?

Speaker: louis falsetti
Dialogue: Yes, your fuckin' majesty!
CONTINUED:

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: What're you doing?!? You gotta behave yourself here!

Speaker: bloodied patron
Dialogue: C'mon, Mr. Green! I didn't do nothing!

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: Well now you're gonna do nothing someplace else!  Throw `em out on their ass. I gotta go upstairs, drop off my keys with the old man.

Speaker: marat buzhayev
Dialogue: Bobby!   Come here!

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: Mr. Buzhayev, how are you!
CONTINUED:

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: Listen, Mr. Buzhayev--I gotta go do something right now. But don't worry--everything's in good shape downstairs.

Speaker: marat buzhayev
Dialogue: Yes, good. You take care of things good for us...

Speaker: kalina buzhayev
Dialogue: Bobby! Where you run off to?!?
CONTINUED:

Speaker: burt grusinsky
Dialogue: Here, take another one! Get another!

Speaker: joseph grusinsky
Dialogue: Pop, they got enough! What're you doin'?!?

Speaker: burt grusinsky
Dialogue: C'mon. With both kids.

Speaker: photographer
Dialogue: Thanks, Chief!
CONTINUED:

Speaker: burt grusinsky
Dialogue: You see your brother yet?

Speaker: joseph grusinsky
Dialogue: He ain't gonna come.

Speaker: burt grusinsky
Dialogue: He better.

Speaker: rosario diaz
Dialogue: C'mon. What's the big deal anyway? We'll go in, you say hello, then we'll go.

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: You remember what I tol' you?

Speaker: rosario diaz
Dialogue: Yeah!   Course!

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: Nobody knows about my father and my brother--not even Jumbo. And it's gotta stay that way, you understand?

Speaker: rosario diaz
Dialogue: Yeah, you tol' me a thousand times. But I been with you for two years, Bobby--I should meet `em by now. We goin' in or not?
CONTINUED: RUSSELL DE KEIFER  It's me, Russell De Keifer, from across Northern Boulevard, remember? You still bartending that Russian joint, out there in Brooklyn?

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: Nah.   Nah, I'm managing now.

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: Yeah. I'll see you `round, arright?

Speaker: rosario diaz
Dialogue: What'd he call you?

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: I changed my name--I use my mother's name now. It's better for business. C'mon...

Speaker: joseph grusinsky
Dialogue: How you doing...
CONTINUED:

Speaker: joseph grusinsky
Dialogue: Feels like nothin'. Nah, it feels good! I love trying to, you know, help make the City safer for people and everything...

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: That's them there. In the corner. Lookit `em--two peas in a pod.

Speaker: rosario diaz
Dialogue: Yeah--I see `em! They don't look that bad though, you know? For cops?  Who're those other guys?

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: [My] Father's friends--they were all in Korea together.  Look, don't talk to nobody, we'll get out quicker.

Speaker: rosario diaz
Dialogue: I ain't gonna embarrass you.

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: N--I just wanna get out quick, that's all...

Speaker: joseph grusinsky
Dialogue: Bobby, hey! You, you got off work and everything--

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: Yeah I did so...congratulations...
CONTINUED:

Speaker: burt grusinsky
Dialogue: Hello.

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: Pop.  Everybody, this is my girlfriend. Rosario.

Speaker: rosario diaz
Dialogue: Nice to meet you!

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: This's my brother. And my father.

Speaker: burt grusinsky
Dialogue: We gotta talk to you. Alone.

Speaker: michael solo
Dialogue: In a house of God, no less? C'mon, get up...
CONTINUED:

Speaker: burt grusinsky
Dialogue: Your hair's long.

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: I know. I like it this way.  That why you got me up here?    [To] tell me my hair's too long?

Speaker: joseph grusinsky
Dialogue: Bobby, I asked Pop to bring you here.

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: Whatsamatter?

Speaker: joseph grusinsky
Dialogue: Well... I'm gonna be heading up a new narcotics team, starting this week. A Russian unit, outta PSA 2 in Brighton.

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: That's a good hook for you.

Speaker: joseph grusinsky
Dialogue: Yeah, they need me over there. There's only eleven guys in the whole department that even know the language right now, so...

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: You ever talk?

Speaker: jack shapiro
Dialogue: I'm old-fashioned. I listen first.

Speaker: joseph grusinsky
Dialogue: Bobby, we need you to do us a favor.
CONTINUED:  You cut me off financially, and now you need the favor? `S interesting.

Speaker: joseph grusinsky
Dialogue: PUDGE--

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: `S good lookin' boy!

Speaker: joseph grusinsky
Dialogue: He's dealing H, cocaine, angel dust... Operates out of that club you manage. The El Caribe.

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: I don't know nothing about that.

Speaker: joseph grusinsky
Dialogue: No, we know that. We checked up and down the rest of management, too--his uncle, the owner--

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: The old man?! What, you been watching us?!?

Speaker: joseph grusinsky
Dialogue: Everybody come up clean. It's just Nezhinski we're lookin' at.

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: What the fuck is this?
CONTINUED:

Speaker: joseph grusinsky
Dialogue: We need to track how he's bringin' in the product and...we were just hopin' you'd keep your eyes and ears open a little.

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: You kidding me? Inform for you?!? That's what you wanted me here for?

Speaker: joseph grusinsky
Dialogue: No, we would never ask you to do that. Just observe, that's all. It's a closed community and you're our only way in right now--

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: Yeah well, find another way. I got a lot invested in that club and I can't let it get fucked up.

Speaker: joseph grusinsky
Dialogue: Nothing's gonna get fucked up, Bobby. All it takes is one thing, you know that! One guy to flip, we crack the whole thing!

Speaker: michael solo
Dialogue: Bobby, it's important. These ain't dumb guys we're talking about. We don't stop `em up front, coupla years from now, it'll be chaos out there.  We'd be wishing the Italians'd come back.

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: [You] Fuckin' broadsided me... Everything's about the goddamned job with you.

Speaker: joseph grusinsky
Dialogue: Whole city's falling apart, Bobby-- don't you got any sense of responsibility at all?
CONTINUED:

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: C'mon... Get off your fuckin' high horse and bust somebody else's balls.

Speaker: burt grusinsky
Dialogue: All right, go downstairs. Lemme talk to him.

Speaker: joseph grusinsky
Dialogue: Thanks for coming.

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: You're welcome.

Speaker: joseph grusinsky
Dialogue: Just be careful out there next coupla weeks.

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: 'S that supposed to mean?!?

Speaker: burt grusinsky
Dialogue: Joseph!

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: Congratulations. You got me up here.

Speaker: burt grusinsky
Dialogue: I knew you wouldn't help us. I told your brother, I said, `no point even bringing him down here.'

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: Good.   Then now you know.

Speaker: burt grusinsky
Dialogue: Hold on a second--lemme ask you a question. That girl of yours downstairs--she Puerto Rican?

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: Yeah.   I like the dark meat.
CONTINUED:

Speaker: burt grusinsky
Dialogue: She hooking you up?

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: Why, you want some?

Speaker: burt grusinsky
Dialogue: Yeah, keep laughing--your mother, rest in peace, I think she was too easy on you.

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: I gotta go, Pop. I'll see you `round.

Speaker: spiro giavannis
Dialogue: Everyone?   Everyone!

Speaker: rosario diaz
Dialogue: You take a picture, it'll last longer.

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: C'mon, let's get outta here, [we'll] go party with Jumbo.

Speaker: rosario diaz
Dialogue: We could stay if you want, baby. They don't like me, I don't care-- you're better than them anyway--
CONTINUED:

Speaker: spiro giavannis
Dialogue: I'm Deputy Commissioner Spiro GIAVANNIS--

Speaker: burt grusinsky
Dialogue: Thank you. You know, I used to tell my kids, "work first, play later," and my son Joseph really took it to heart. He's been a real fighter over the years... He overcome his mother's passing, and the dyslexia--eventually wound up graduating John Jay as salutatorian and distinguished himself many times.  Anyway, you've shown yourself to be very brave and selfless, and I'm just, I'm very proud here tonight.

Speaker: joseph grusinsky
Dialogue: Thank you everybody for coming-- happy Thanksgiving. Before I say anything else... We got some bad news this morning.

CONTINUED:  One of our Irish brothers was killed in the line of duty last night--detective Edward Conlon was gunned down serving a warrant on Northern Boulevard. The clock's about to strike ten, so I thought we might give a moment of silence to remember.

Speaker: rosario diaz
Dialogue: I'm gonna be like Madonna. You think I'm like Madonna...?

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: You're just like her, baby...
CONTINUED:

Speaker: rosario diaz
Dialogue: I talked to my mother yesterday. She said she'd be okay by herself, so I could move in if I want...

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: That's cool.

Speaker: rosario diaz
Dialogue: Your family ain't gonna be too happy, though. I saw how they looked at me.

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: It's all right--they don't like nobody outside their own little world.

Speaker: rosario diaz
Dialogue: Yeah...you know, cops're fucked up. In my neighborhood, if they ain't taking money, they're beating on you for no reason...

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: My brother and my father ain't like that. It's just--the whole thing ain't for me, that's all.

Speaker: rosario diaz
Dialogue: WAIT--
CONTINUED:

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: What is it?

Speaker: rosario diaz
Dialogue: Open it up!

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: ...it's beautiful...

Speaker: rosario diaz
Dialogue: I love you... And someday we're gonna get a big house together, in New Jersey, with a lotta kids...

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: Only if you behave yourself...

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: Uh oh--[The] party's really gonna get started now!

Speaker: louis falsetti
Dialogue: Yeah--let's all play Spin my Pickle!

Speaker: freddie
Dialogue: Hey Falsetti!    You get what we wanted?
CONTINUED:

Speaker: louis falsetti
Dialogue: See, I woulda been here sooner, `cept I hadda go across town, lose all the cops--

Speaker: hazel
Dialogue: There weren't no cops following us!

Speaker: louis falsetti
Dialogue: Shut your mouth! You wouldn't recognize `em--they were, they were all undercover.

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: Any Spanish Fly in there for you?

Speaker: louis falsetti
Dialogue: Yeah, you need that, not me!

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: I'm goin' up to see Buzhayev tonight. I think he's gonna ask me to buy into the club.

Speaker: louis falsetti
Dialogue: Yeah? Well, you know what you should do, you should turn it into a fag joint and then maybe they'll let ya in!
CONTINUED:

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: I'll show you a fuckin' faggot!

Speaker: michael solo
Dialogue: The spot's got one main entrance, two rear fire exits. All of `em'll be covered.

Speaker: joseph grusinsky
Dialogue: Good. I just wanna make sure we take it easy in there. We don't want no panic.

Speaker: jack shapiro
Dialogue: What if your brother's inside?

Speaker: joseph grusinsky
Dialogue: It's his day off. He ain't gonna be there.

Speaker: michael solo
Dialogue: What if he is?    We still go?

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: No no, I'm all right... Hi everybody...

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: Everything's really rockin' tonight. Line's halfway `round the block.

Speaker: marat buzhayev
Dialogue: Yes, it's good...

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: You wanted to talk to me?

Speaker: marat buzhayev
Dialogue: You know, maybe we open another spot next year. Across from Brighton.
CONTINUED:

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: 'S a good move.

Speaker: marat buzhayev
Dialogue: We need someone in charge here full- time, then. And we think you do a great job.

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: I appreciate that. You know, I been thinking `bout it--I'd like to become a partner here too--buy in with you.  I mean, I got a lot of ideas.

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: Well, I just think we could do more. Maybe expand into Sheepshead Bay. I know a good spot--we add a restaurant there, get the spill- over. Like what your brother did, in Miami.

Speaker: eli mirichenko
Dialogue: That's gonna take a lot of money, Papa. Your fur business can support that right now?

Speaker: marat buzhayev
Dialogue: My son-in-law, he worries people take advantage of me.

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: I can understand that. But I got money to invest--we could make it something real special over there. Do what I did downstairs--you know, bring in name DJs on different nights?  What do you think?
CONTINUED:

Speaker: marat buzhayev
Dialogue: Yes. Together we do it. You come to our Thanksgiving again, on Thursday?

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: Yeah, sure.   I'll come.

Speaker: marat buzhayev
Dialogue: Good--we talk more, at the dinner.

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: Nah nah, no thank you...

Speaker: louis falsetti
Dialogue: My brother! How'd it go?  Ho, well! I'm guessing it went pretty good then!

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: Listen--I get this done, I want you to be a host. In one of our spots.

Speaker: louis falsetti
Dialogue: That's my specialty. I'm whaddaya call, a people person!

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: Well, just make sure you get your old co-workers from the Health Department to give us a pass on the kitchen.
CONTINUED:

Speaker: louis falsetti
Dialogue: Yeah, no problem--half of `em got rats as pets anyway.

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: Where's Rosario?

Speaker: louis falsetti
Dialogue: She's a player, Bob. You know how it goes.

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: Look at him... I'll tell you, [when] this is my place, we'll kick his fuckin' ass right outta here--

Speaker: louis falsetti
Dialogue: Bob! You gotta watch your mouth! I mean, he don't scare me, but uh, but trust me, I know.

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: Yeah, you know a lot.

Speaker: louis falsetti
Dialogue: I do, I'm serious!  Last year, one of his guys was gonna flip? Jesus Christ, what I saw...

Speaker: louis falsetti
Dialogue: Nezhinski dragged him into the toilet. They stood him up against the wall and held him--

Speaker: louis falsetti
Dialogue: Worst thing I ever seen in my life, Bob.  Anyway, cops found his head in the middle of Brighton Avenue the next day--fuckin' dick was in his mouth.

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: You sure it wasn't your dick?

Speaker: louis falsetti
Dialogue: Yeah, that's funny.  You sure it wasn't your mouth?

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: Shit... I'll be right back.
CONTINUED:

Speaker: rosario diaz
Dialogue: Hi, honey!

Speaker: vadim nezhinski
Dialogue: Bobby--c'mon, join us! I wanna talk to you!

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: Things're goin' good.

Speaker: vadim nezhinski
Dialogue: That's real good... `Cause you gotta be happy, you know? All my guys, I tell `em, the mind and the body, they're connected. That's how you stay sharp.

Speaker: pavel lubyarsky
Dialogue: This's "Kid Quick" you're talking to, dude. Best fuckin' middleweight in the Ukraine.

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: He don't look like a middleweight no more.
CONTINUED:

Speaker: vadim nezhinski
Dialogue: You know Bobby, my uncle upstairs, he, he likes you a lot. Practically thinks you're one of his kids.

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: Your uncle's a great man. Smart man.

Speaker: vadim nezhinski
Dialogue: Yeah... Smart smart stupid. Got his head buried in books all day, `stead of the real world...

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: Your uncle loses his license, he ain't gonna be too happy.

Speaker: vadim nezhinski
Dialogue: Well, upstairs don't gotta know everything, am I right? Place gets packed every night, everybody wins.

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: Yeah...I'll think about that. Rosario--I wanna talk to you.

Speaker: vadim nezhinski
Dialogue: Go ahead.   We'll talk.
CONTINUED:

Speaker: rosario diaz
Dialogue: It go good upstairs, baby?

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: You gotta stop dealing. You hear what I'm telling you?

Speaker: rosario diaz
Dialogue: Yeah, I heard. But I need the money right now, Bobby. And I'm not gonna rely on you for EVERYTHING--

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: Just hold off then, for a little while. Okay? I got my reasons.

Speaker: rosario diaz
Dialogue: I love you...

Speaker: joseph grusinsky
Dialogue: Everybody! Get your hands on your head and don't fuckin' move!  Turn off that music. Right now!

Speaker: cops
Dialogue: Holy shit! Get the extinguishers-- call paramedics!

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: Gimme your shit!

Speaker: uniformed cop
Dialogue: Hey! I saw that! Get your hands on your fuckin' head!

Speaker: paramedic
Dialogue: Arright, open up--a little charcoal, to absorb the toxin...
CONTINUED:

Speaker: joseph grusinsky
Dialogue: Give everybody a toss. G.Q.--

Speaker: michael solo
Dialogue: You got anything in there?
CONTINUED:

Speaker: louis falsetti
Dialogue: Jesus, that cop's crazy!

Speaker: uniformed cop
Dialogue: Hey! Fat Albert! Shut your fuckin' mouth!

Speaker: joseph grusinsky
Dialogue: What's the star for?

Speaker: vadim nezhinski
Dialogue: That one's for God.

Speaker: michael solo
Dialogue: Coupla dimes on `em--cocaine, a little PCP.

Speaker: joseph grusinsky
Dialogue: Okay, let's go. You. And you--  You're under arrest, possession and sale of narcotics--
CONTINUED:

Speaker: portly cop
Dialogue: Jesus Christ, what the hell's goin' on in here?

Speaker: uniformed cop
Dialogue: Russian guy fuckin' slashed himself!

Speaker: burt grusinsky
Dialogue: Where you going? I was the one who got you outta there!
CONTINUED:

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: Thanks a lot.    I appreciate it.

Speaker: burt grusinsky
Dialogue: You're a real big shot, aren't you! You see what happened in there last night? Hey--I'm talking to you!

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: Okay, I'll go thank him too then. He comes in, raids the fuckin' place--now I gotta go beg `em not to fire me--

Speaker: burt grusinsky
Dialogue: Fire you?! From what? Probably the best thing that ever happened to you!

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: Fuck you, Pop.    Fuck the both of you's.

Speaker: burt grusinsky
Dialogue: Don't EVER speak to me like that again. You hear me? I'll rap you right in the mouth!

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: You fuckin' touch me!? You gonna fuckin' touch me?!?
CONTINUED:

Speaker: marat buzhayev
Dialogue: No no--it's okay. Say hello...

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: Mr. Buzhayev... I'm real sorry about what happened the other night.  [If] I was working, maybe I would've been able to do something, but... Anyway, I'm sorry.

Speaker: marat buzhayev
Dialogue: It's not your fault...
CONTINUED:

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: You don't mind my saying, I think that's probably the right thing to do.  Things get back to normal, I'm hoping we could get started on what we talked about.

Speaker: marat buzhayev
Dialogue: We need time for the bad publicity to go away.

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: Mr. Buzhayev, my getting arrested ain't gonna be a problem. I don't got a record--

Speaker: marat buzhayev
Dialogue: I know.   I don't worry about any of that.

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: Yeah...   All right...

Speaker: marat buzhayev
Dialogue: You take some time off, everything will be fixed in a little bit. Then you come back. I pay you for the time. Come on...

Speaker: joseph grusinsky
Dialogue: He stabbed himself, he was a bundle guy. Mighta known how they're movin' it. See, that's the key--

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: You had to hit that spot.

Speaker: joseph grusinsky
Dialogue: Nezhinski was seen there, Bobby! What am I supposed to do--announce it in advance, compromise the whole thing?  C'mon.

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: I had plans down there.

Speaker: joseph grusinsky
Dialogue: Yeah, well, I tried. What do you want from me, anyway? You know, you're standing there feeling sorry for yourself, but you wouldn't be in this shit if you didn't fuck around in the first place.

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: You got real balls saying that to me. I made something for myself, and you come in and fuck it up? Just `cause I'm not trying to be like you? And Pop--

Speaker: joseph grusinsky
Dialogue: Bobby, you're the one acting like you're above it all all the time!
CONTINUED: JOSEPH GRUSINSKY  Fuckin' around with your little Puerto Rican all day--

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: What did you call her?

Speaker: joseph grusinsky
Dialogue: You heard me. Have some fucking class for once.

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: You piece of shit...

Speaker: joseph grusinsky
Dialogue: [You] go around like you're a big shot... You're a joke! Grow up already! Fuckin' loser...

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: Fine with me, you motherfucker!

Speaker: michael solo
Dialogue: I don't know, Joe--forgive me, but uh, your brother... Ever since your mother got sick--

Speaker: joseph grusinsky
Dialogue: We'll pick this up tomorrow. I'm gonna go home.
CONTINUED:

Speaker: burt grusinsky
Dialogue: You gotta keep your hands up! Keep your hands up!

Speaker: uniformed cop
Dialogue: Chief...?

Speaker: burt grusinsky
Dialogue: Which kid is it?

Speaker: police chaplain
Dialogue: It's Joseph. He's at St. John's Hospital.  It don't look good right now.

Speaker: uniformed cop
Dialogue: You want us to contact your other son--?

Speaker: burt grusinsky
Dialogue: No.   Go on, I'll be right out...

Speaker: rosario diaz
Dialogue: Baby, you got a little bruise here--

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: That ain't nothing.

Speaker: louis falsetti
Dialogue: I got a bruise too, you know--right here!

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: We'll see you and bump you two C's.

Speaker: louis falsetti
Dialogue: We will?
CONTINUED:

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: Siegfried and Roy, baby! Two fucking queens!

Speaker: louis falsetti
Dialogue: Bobkes, I love you!

Speaker: rosario diaz
Dialogue: Bobby--it's for you!

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: Who is it?

Speaker: louis falsetti
Dialogue: I was the one told him to keep goin'!

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: Hello?
CONTINUED:

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: Is--is he gonna be all right?

Speaker: michael solo
Dialogue: Listen, your father's coming--I gotta go. But he's at St. John's.

Speaker: rosario diaz
Dialogue: Bobby?

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: My brother was shot...they're operating on him now.

Speaker: rosario diaz
Dialogue: You gotta go see him--be there for him and your father.

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: Game's over, everybody.

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: That's right.    I gotta go.

Speaker: louis falsetti
Dialogue: Bobkes--?   What's wrong?

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: What're you doing?

Speaker: rosario diaz
Dialogue: I wanna come too. For you--
CONTINUED:

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: No--it's gonna be a fuckin' scene. I'll call you later.

Speaker: rosario diaz
Dialogue: BOBBY--

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: Don't argue.

Speaker: louis falsetti
Dialogue: Sure, Bob. Everything cool?

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: Yeah, no--I just remembered I gotta do something, that's all--

Speaker: other players
Dialogue: Hey--HEY!     What the fuck?!?

Speaker: louis falsetti
Dialogue: Take it easy, TAKE IT EASY! Calm down and everything'll be, uh, non compos mentis!
CONTINUED:

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: Pop?

Speaker: burt grusinsky
Dialogue: What do you want? You stayed out of it--you got what you wanted. Why don't you go somewhere and pick a fight--you're good at that!

Speaker: mustachioed cop
Dialogue: Chief, the union sent a shrink over for you--

Speaker: burt grusinsky
Dialogue: Nah, I don't want that crap.

Speaker: mayor
Dialogue: Chief Grusinsky, an attack on an officer is an attack on society. Whoever did this, in a clean neighborhood like that--they gotta be hunted down like animals.

Speaker: burt grusinsky
Dialogue: We'll get `em, your honor. I'm gonna come back in and run it myself--we'll get `em.
CONTINUED:

Speaker: michael solo

Dialogue: Don't fuckin' look at him! I said don't--back up! Don't look at him...
CONTINUED:

Speaker: rosario diaz
Dialogue: Bobby?   Could I call my mother...?

Speaker: jack shapiro
Dialogue: No I.D. on the guys in the car. Probably illegals. But Mike--  --We had that place locked up tight. How they knew where they were, I go no idea.

Speaker: michael solo
Dialogue: We gotta get you to a secure location, Bobby--

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: Does my brother know yet?

Speaker: michael solo
Dialogue: They had to sedate him.

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: Then you gotta take me to him...  I wanna go see him...

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: Joseph?

Speaker: joseph grusinsky
Dialogue: ...I'll catch `em, Bobby. Don't worry...

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: I don't know if I can do that.   I MEAN--  I saw him die...

Speaker: undertaker
Dialogue: We know mere words cannot suffice in this time of tragedy. We're so very sorry about your loss...
CONTINUED:

Speaker: joseph grusinsky
Dialogue: That's right...

Speaker: undertaker
Dialogue: Could you come with me please?  We'll be right back.

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: You gonna fuckin' catch these guys?

Speaker: jack shapiro
Dialogue: All our uncles on the street been hearing about a big deal, goin' down maybe Monday or Tuesday.  They don't know where yet, but...we got a feeling--[now that] Nezhinski's out, he's gonna be there.

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: You gotta find that spot...
CONTINUED:

Speaker: michael solo
Dialogue: You and your brother don't gotta worry about any of that. Just take the time you need--

Speaker: joseph grusinsky
Dialogue: MIKE--

Speaker: joseph grusinsky
Dialogue: Bobby... I'm real glad you're with me now...

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: Course...

Speaker: joseph grusinsky
Dialogue: You know, I was...I was jealous of you, [for a] long time.
CONTINUED:

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: No.... I did it to hurt him...   I disappointed him...

Speaker: undertaker
Dialogue: Gentlemen?
CONTINUED:

Speaker: joseph grusinsky
Dialogue: ...It's all right... I'll be all right...

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: I can't live like this no more, Mike... They destroyed my family.  There's a deal going down, I... I wanna help...

Speaker: michael solo
Dialogue: You're a civilian, Bobby. Ain't no way.

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: I, I could join you.
CONTINUED:

Speaker: michael solo
Dialogue: Bobby, come on--you got your own life to live--

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: No.   I can't do nothing else now.

Speaker: michael solo
Dialogue: Then you gotta understand--this ain't something you do just for a vendetta. You gotta go back to the Academy when you're done, you gotta commit yourself.

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: I know.

Speaker: michael solo
Dialogue: Gimme a couple days--I'll talk to the P.C.

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: Joe, I'm gonna join you. I just decided...  Okay?

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: I wanna talk to you about something.

Speaker: rosario diaz
Dialogue: Bobby, I don't know if I can be here no more.

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: What're you talking about? I just got through telling you--

Speaker: rosario diaz
Dialogue: No, I think maybe it's time I leave then--go down to Miami on my own, with my mother.
CONTINUED:

Speaker: rosario diaz
Dialogue: You know that's not true, Bobby. They're not after me.

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: Hold on a second--I know what I'm talking about'd be a change.  It'd be a big change for us.

Speaker: rosario diaz
Dialogue: BOBBY--

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: But we could make a life here. This'd be something we could build on. We could raise a family, and...

Speaker: rosario diaz
Dialogue: No I wouldn't...  They know what I was--what I was DOING--

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: They'll accept you if we're TOGETHER--

Speaker: rosario diaz
Dialogue: Bobby!

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: Gave it up? Gave up what?
CONTINUED:  What fuckin' life did you have? You're a fuckin' cokehead--look at you!

Speaker: rosario diaz
Dialogue: And you were clean, Bobby? We were TOGETHER--

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: Well, maybe I was a piece of shit too! Wasting my goddamned time!

Speaker: rosario diaz
Dialogue: How could you say that...? We had PLANS--

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: Wake up!   All that was nothing!

Speaker: rosario diaz
Dialogue: No! Now is nothing! Look at what's happened to your family, Bobby--your father, he's dead--look at your brother! It could all happen to you!

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: My brother's gonna be all right-- and nothing's gonna happen to me.

Speaker: rosario diaz
Dialogue: That's what you said before.

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: Hey--where you goin'--

Speaker: rosario diaz
Dialogue: Get off me!   Let me go!

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: What the fuck you doin'?

Speaker: rosario diaz
Dialogue: Get off me!
CONTINUED:

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: All right. Why don't you just calm down and think about it a little.

Speaker: spiro giavannis
Dialogue: The Commissioner is here now, and he's ready to go.
CONTINUED:

Speaker: commissioner ruddy
Dialogue: We're all very sorry about your father--he was a great man.

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: Thank you, sir. I'm gonna try and do my part too, now.

Speaker: commissioner ruddy
Dialogue: Good.   Raise your right hand.

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: "I, Robert Green, hereby pledge and DECLARE--

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: "--that I will support and defend the Constitution, both of the United States government and the State of New York, to the best of my ability..."

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: "...I will faithfully discharge my duties in the rank of rider in the New York City Police Department. So help me God."
CONTINUED:

Speaker: jack shapiro
Dialogue: Everybody's out there, bustin' balls, left and right! What else you want us to do?

Speaker: uniformed officer
Dialogue: Bobby, a Rosario Diaz's been callin' for you. She says she needs to talk to you.

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: Thanks.   I'll call her back.

Speaker: joseph grusinsky
Dialogue: What about Nezhinski's uncle? That clubowner--Marat Buzhayev?
CONTINUED:

Speaker: jack shapiro
Dialogue: Clean. We tailed him for weeks. Goes out with his grandkids, takes `em horseriding at Floyd Bennett Field... Checks on his fur business from time to time--we even looked at some of the coats and tore `em apart. Turned out to be fake sable, if you could believe it.

Speaker: joseph grusinsky
Dialogue: It's comin' up quick, we don't know anything... We're gonna lose it...

Speaker: michael solo
Dialogue: Joe--this is still new territory for all of us. I mean, we hadda use your brother here to get any results to begin with.

Speaker: joseph grusinsky
Dialogue: I know that. And my family takes the hit--my family...

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: Could you guys go outside for a minute? I wanna talk to my brother.

Speaker: joseph grusinsky
Dialogue: We don't got much time...we lose Nezhinski, we're both dead... [The] streets'll get flooded, the whole City's gonna be on fire--

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: We could handle it. I mean, I come on to help you--
CONTINUED:

Speaker: joseph grusinsky
Dialogue: Well, I didn't ask you to do that. I don't need your help--I could deal with it on my own.

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: I know. But you don't gotta do everything yourself. That's what I'm trying to tell you.

Speaker: joseph grusinsky
Dialogue: It's not that. It's just... You give up what you wanted to do to be here, Bobby. And part of me feels a little responsible.

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: Nah, you didn't do nothing. It's meant to be. You can't fuckin' control it...

Speaker: joseph grusinsky
Dialogue: You know, I remember when Pop was mad at you, he always used to say you didn't believe in our family. And Mom, she'd protect you. She'd give you those little caramels... Anyway, I knew he was wrong too, but I didn't say nothing.

Speaker: uniformed officer
Dialogue: Bobby, Rosario Diaz just called again.

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: Tell her I'm on my way back now.
CONTINUED:  I'll see you later.

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: What happened--where'd she go?!?

Speaker: guard
Dialogue: She left about an hour ago.   She said to give you this--

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: We gotta go find her!

Speaker: guard
Dialogue: She asked us not to, Bobby. She's-- Bobby--we can't do that legally!

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: DON'T--FUCKIN'--
CONTINUED:

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: You gonna keep me here? HUH?!?

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: It's me, Lou.
CONTINUED:

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: I'm okay. Listen uh, you ain't spoke to Rosario lately, have you?

Speaker: louis falsetti
Dialogue: No. She's holed up with you, ain't she?--God knows where.

Speaker: louis falsetti
Dialogue: Well, I talk to her, I'll tell her you called.

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: Thanks... You know, things are really changing on my end. I ain't gonna be in protection anymore.

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: ...I, I don't know...

Speaker: louis falsetti
Dialogue: My brother!   The Grand Return!
CONTINUED:

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: No...

Speaker: louis falsetti
Dialogue: Hey Natasha, over there!

Speaker: hazel
Dialogue: Why don't you slow down a little? You're already acting stupid!

Speaker: louis falsetti
Dialogue: And you're already acting like a pain in my ass! I can hold my liquor and yours!

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: Jumbo, I don't want nothing right now--don't worry about it.

Speaker: marat buzhayev
Dialogue: Good evening. My name is Marat Buzhayev, and I'm the owner of the El Caribe. We have a special night, tonight--the Odessa Dance Troop is here to perform for us. I know you'll enjoy it.
CONTINUED:

Speaker: eli mirichenko
Dialogue: My father-in-law would love it if you come upstairs later, to say hello.

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: Okay, Eli.   Tell him I'll come up.

Speaker: louis falsetti
Dialogue: Bob, you all right?

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: Rosario--Rosario's gone down to Florida for a little while.

Speaker: louis falsetti
Dialogue: Florida?  Well, she probably just needed a little time for herself. She'll be back.

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: Yeah...  You know, I was just thinking `bout when I first met her here... Working back there...

Speaker: louis falsetti
Dialogue: Ah, don't worry, Bob. I have no doubt she'll be back.
CONTINUED:

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: Louis--?  How'd you know where I was staying?

Speaker: louis falsetti
Dialogue: Huh?

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: How'd you know where I was staying?

Speaker: louis falsetti
Dialogue: It was, it was in the papers...

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: It wasn't in no papers, Louis. Don't make me embarrass you. Let's go outside, right now.

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: Where's Nezhinski?

Speaker: louis falsetti
Dialogue: I don't know--

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: Don't play games with me, Louis.

Speaker: louis falsetti
Dialogue: But I don't kn--

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: I just said, DO NOT PLAY GAMES WITH ME!  Rosario tol' you where we were staying, didn't she?!? She trusted you...
CONTINUED:

Speaker: louis falsetti
Dialogue: Bob, we're, we're buddies--we're like brothers! C'mon!

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: You don't mean nothing to me now-- that part of my life is dead.  Today it ended for good...

Speaker: louis falsetti
Dialogue: Bobby I swear--I don't know nothing!

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: You know my father is dead because of you?

Speaker: louis falsetti
Dialogue: No, wait! Bob, please!  Don't do this to me Bob, please...

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: You tell me what you know right now or I swear to Christ I will make you disappear.

Speaker: louis falsetti
Dialogue: Bobby, I... I told `em where you were--but, but it ain't what you think! I was makin' a buy and these guys in hoods, they held a gun to my head--so I tried to give `em the wrong information!
CONTINUED:

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: You tell me, right now--  Where's your fuckin' spot?!?
CONTINUED:

Speaker: man's voice
Dialogue: Tomorrow.

Speaker: eli mirichenko
Dialogue: After tomorrow, everybody's gonna get well.

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: Well, he said tomorrow and that's what matters.

Speaker: michael solo
Dialogue: They're movin' serious weight, we might be talkin' major league firepower. Maybe we call in the Feds.
CONTINUED:

Speaker: jack shapiro
Dialogue: The Feds?

Speaker: michael solo
Dialogue: Each one of `em's got 25 years on the job with this kinda thing, Pudge.

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: They got one year of experience, repeated 25 times.

Speaker: jack shapiro
Dialogue: Bobby's right.

Speaker: joseph grusinsky
Dialogue: Yeah, definitely... We'll get the TAC plan together...  And wherever it is, we'll be ready for `em...

Speaker: michael solo
Dialogue: Arright, guys.    That's it for now.

Speaker: jack shapiro
Dialogue: JOE--

Speaker: joseph grusinsky
Dialogue: Yeah?

Speaker: jack shapiro
Dialogue: You know, they're laughin' at us, out there on the street. Now when we get there, it'll be up to you what we do. But I hope you think about droppin' the hammer on `em.
CONTINUED:

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: All right, c'mon. Enough...
CONTINUED:

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: We're gonna get all of `em today.

Speaker: michael solo
Dialogue: Okay--when they complete the sale, that's when we move. ESU'll grab the kids.
CONTINUED: MARAT BUZHAYEV  Each load is completely untraceable. It's my own method.

Speaker: joseph grusinsky
Dialogue: The deal's closing--let's go!

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: You're surrounded by the police! Come out now, with your hands on your heads!
CONTINUED:

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: Joe?!
CONTINUED:

Speaker: jack shapiro
Dialogue: Stop!   Halt!
CONTINUED:

Speaker: michael solo
Dialogue: This's too dangerous. We'll all wind up killing each other--

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: Vadim is in here with us. Radio our guys, tell `em to get into the clearing.

Speaker: man's voice
Dialogue: Bobby!   We got the old man!

Speaker: jack shapiro
Dialogue: We got the old man--Buzhayev. Up by the cars. His grandkids are safe--they're in the van.

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: Are all our guys out?
CONTINUED:

Speaker: michael solo
Dialogue: Bobby?   What're you doin'--

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: I'm not gonna let him get away...

Speaker: vadim nezhinski
Dialogue: Don't...don't let me die in here...
CONTINUED:

Speaker: marat buzhayev
Dialogue: Bobby--I, I didn't know it would be your family--

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: Get down!   On the ground!

Speaker: random officers
Dialogue: Bobby! Hey! Lookit you--six months in the Academy and already you look like a chief!

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: Hey everybody...

Speaker: michael solo
Dialogue: I just saw the commissioner. A lotta people're gonna wanna talk to you--important people. About maybe settin' you up with your own unit.

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: All right.   We'll talk about that after.

Speaker: joseph grusinsky
Dialogue: You know, I think Pop would be real happy to see you like this.

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: I don't think he'd believe it... But I guess things don't always go the way you think they will.
CONTINUED:

Speaker: joseph grusinsky
Dialogue: Ah, the Force'll treat you good. I'm sure you do very well.

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: You definitely gonna leave? Ain't no way you change your mind?

Speaker: joseph grusinsky
Dialogue: It's the right thing. It's over for me--I'm out.

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: Listen, we'll spend some more time together from now on. Okay? I'll come over next week.

Speaker: joseph grusinsky
Dialogue: Arright, yeah.    Sounds good.

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: Chaplain? I'd like you to introduce me this way. If you don't mind.

Speaker: police chaplain
Dialogue: Ladies and gentlemen: we shall begin today's ceremony with the traditional invocation, moving then to the valedictorian address to be given by...Robert Grusinsky. Son of the late Deputy Chief Albert Grusinsky, brother of Captain Joseph Grusinsky.
CONTINUED:

Speaker: joseph grusinsky
Dialogue: I love you, Bobby.

Speaker: bobby green
Dialogue: Love you too, Joe.
